channel.title: Getting Un on Chris Umphlett

item.title: Getting Unstuck: Ch 1, How We Get Stuck
item.description: I am reading Matt Perman’s How to Get Unstuck and taking on the writing exercise at the end of each chapter. More information in this article on the introduction. Chapter 1 describes what Perman says are the three ways we get stuck: 1. We don’t know what God wants us to do 2. We know but we don’t know how to make it happen 3. Obstacles prevent us from doing it.
